title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, we distribute the actions on a personal taste basis. This should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view in order to access all actions from the editor.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is missing from the context menu.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be included in the context menu.
SR: 1. Open the editor. 2. Select some text within the editor. 3. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu. 4. Check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is visible in the context menu.
